entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
